summary: An ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 504 for the improvement of Galer Street, in the City of Seattle by placing a 6-foot wood sidewalk along the south side thereof from 7th Avenue West to 10th Avenue West, under Ordinance No. 7270 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
